dialogue.text: Mood, what are you doing? Stop this madness!

response.text: I can't believe you would do this, Mood! I thought you were better than this!
response.speaker: River

dialogue.text: Deanna, are you okay? I'll make sure Mood won't hurt you again.

response.text: I'm fine, thanks for protecting me, River.
response.speaker: Deanna

dialogue.text: Mood, why are you doing this? We've known each other for so long!

response.text: I don't know what's gotten into you, Mood, but this has to stop!
response.speaker: Deanna

dialogue.text: I'll make sure you pay for what you've done, Mood.

response.text: I'll make sure justice is served for your actions.
response.speaker: Deanna

dialogue.text: Deanna, you're too dangerous. I have to stop you.

response.text: I'm sorry, Deanna and River, but I must do this for the greater good.
response.speaker: Mood

dialogue.text: I'll make sure justice is served.

response.text: I know this is hard for you to understand, but trust me, it's for the best.
response.speaker: Mood
